spawned-objects.desc:
Non-forage objects, like gems and minerals.
Default: true
tree-forage.desc:
Items from shaking trees, like seeds and Hazelnuts.
Default: true
mushroom-boxes.desc:
Works in any location.
Default: true
garbage-cans.desc:
Warning: Will cause lag when combined with Allow Global Collector.
Default: true
slime-balls.desc:
Slime Balls created by Slimes inside Slime Hutches.
Default: true
garden-pots.desc: Couples with Crops, Forage and Tea Bushes to determine what can be collected.
global-collector.desc:
Enables the use of the global Collector hotkey, which collects from every location. Also effects panning spots if enabled.
Warning: Will cause lag when combined with Garbage Cans.
Does not run on day start.
Default: false
global-collector.func-desc: Keybinds to manually perform global collection action.
inventory-anywhere.desc:
Enables the Open Collector Inventory hotkey, allowing access to the inventory from anywhere.
Default: false
all-logging.desc:
Enables all console logging.
Default: false
collection-logging.desc:
Enables logging for primary Collector function.
Will not show panning collection that happens on time change.
Default: false
panning-logging.desc:
Enables logging for panning collection that occurs on time change.
Warning: this happens every time the in-game clock changes, it can get very spammy.
Default: false
informational-logging.desc:
Enables logging non-collection information such as location names with Collectors.
Default: false
grabber-recipes.desc:
Recipes to convert from Auto-Grabber to Collector and back again.
Default: false
